titles.title: A bill to recognize the Cabinet status of the Administrator of the Small Business Administration.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to Subcommittee on SBA, and the General Economy.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Administrator of the Small Business Administration should be designated by the President as a member of the Cabinet and as the principal advisor on small business matters. Upgrades such position to level I of the Executive Schedule.
